website_summaries.verdict: This clock has lots of features for a low price, but it is also less user friendly than others on our short list.
pros: With variable brightness levels and sounds, FM radio, and 7 colors, this model has the features users love in a wake-up light for a surprisingly low price
cons: Owners gripe about how difficult it is to program, and the instructions aren't very helpful
Light is bright and sound is tinny

customer_reviews.title: Great for the short dark days
customer_reviews.text: We love the sunrise alarm clock. We have it in our sons room as a cue when he can get out of bed. On days he doesn't get up before the light it offers an ease into the day. It's a great amount of light to mimic the sunrise especially with the days getting shorter. The base is sturdy and the snooze button is easy to hit. Lots of features on this alarm clock. I would recommend this for everyday use and for kids to learn when it's time to get out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: I am a little perplexed by the positive reviews. This clock is a piece of junk. Good luck getting it to actually work every time you want to use it. I set it, after deciphering the instructions (btw it also only works periodically), and it worked one morning and not the next. It’s not very intuitive and the buttons don’t always work properly so it can be frustrating trying to set it. Not quite sure what the fuss is about but I’m not happy with my purchase at all. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: hard to program
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but is so difficult to program. I thought I had a pretty solid brain with the cognitive ability to set an alarm and time. Not so. Even when I would follow the directions- if I would press the home button too many times, the whole thing would shut down and I would have to unplug it and let it reboot. I felt it was more of an old school computer than an alarm. I would return it if I hadn't thrown the box
customer_reviews.author: Sally S.

customer_reviews.title: Fake reviews, barely functional product.
customer_reviews.text: No idea why this is an "Amazon Choice". Reference this product on the Fakespot website and you'll see it gets an F rating due to its countless fake five-star reviews. Product instructions are not clear at all, and the product doesn't work properly. Light immediately turns on at full brightness before the alarm is set to go off, making this product useless. I wanted a clock that emulates a sunrise; that function doesn't work as advertised. Also, the nature sounds are very cheap sounding, and the speaker sounds horrible. This clock can tell time, and has an adjustable light that has color options, but I would not recommend using this as an alarm clock. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Corey D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Multi-Function Alarm
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty excited about my new alarm clock. It boasts many cool features including 7 different alarm and sleep timer sound options, 6 color options (with 10 levels of brightness) and an FM radio option. The radio has great sound for its size and I really like the sunrise and sunset options with the light.
customer_reviews.author: Katey Pooh

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had purchased a different brand or model ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had purchased a different brand or model because this one is extremely difficult to set and change the alarm daily. The cap that holds the battery was broken on arrival. Otherwise, the concept of the “sunrise simulation” is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Absolute waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Counterintuitive controls make it frustrating to use. The alarm lasts only 5 minutes then it shuts off. The wake up light is not bright enough to be useful, but the dimmer setting of illumination for the display is somehow bright enough that I keep it face down on my nightstand to keep it from adding too much light to the room. This is basically a paperweight at this point. I hate it and keep it as a reminder to not burn money (and the radio isnt awful for an alarm clock, though at least once a month it cycles through radio stations instead of turning on and off - multi control poor choice #14)
customer_reviews.author: L&D

customer_reviews.title: Turn off after 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a really neat alarm clock. I’ve found the sunrise aspect of it makes it easier to wake up in the morning (if I’ve gotten enough sleep). I only have one major complaint, and that’s the the alarm turns itself off after five minutes. Even with the sunrise, I still need several minutes to convince myself to get out of bed and it always turns off before I’ve managed to get up, which makes it way too easy to fall back asleep. I wish it would go off until I turned it off instead of turning itself off. I typically set a back up alarm on my phone just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Matney

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I have no idea how loud the alarm is because I got it for my three year old and we put it at the lowest volume possible (which is off). We set it up so when the green light comes on she’s allowed to come get us in the morning. The light can be adjusted as well as the clock it brightness itself. You can even turn the clock off altogether. she loves the light and that she can pick different colors. But as of now, green means go.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen buttons work only sometimes.
customer_reviews.text: I Love love love this clock but I Hate that sometimes the touch screen buttons do not work right. The alarm button is the one I have had the most problems with. A good trick is to touch the settings button and it'll usually flash or turn on and then the alarm button will work. I just hope this little trick keeps on working for me. The sun simulation is really helpful for waking me up. I Hate lights being turned on but the gradual brightness doesn't bother me as bad and helps me to wake up in the mornings. And other than the touch screen buttons being iffy everything else works great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Unique Way to Wake Up
customer_reviews.text: We've wanted one of these for a while and are pretty pleased with the purchase. The clock makes it easier to get up by gently waking you with the gradually brightening light. And I like that you can turn off the display to keep the room darker while you sleep. I don't care for the alarm sounds, but the chirping birds are okay. There also isn't an easy way to turn the alarm off (touch screen rather than a button, which is a pain when you're getting up, half asleep). All in all, it's a good lamp and we're happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Circelli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Clock!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock for my almost 12 year old and it's great! It has several different light options, a radio, multiple sound options and is easy to read. I really do think that the light coming on 15 minutes prior to the alarm going off is helpful in waking him up. Plus he isn't jarred awake by that awful, standard alarm sound that we all know. I wish this had been around when I was growing up, it would have made mornings easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Wendorf

customer_reviews.title: Bright light!!!
customer_reviews.text: Felt like someone turned on the hall light... Probably should have bought a timer for my lamp instead, at least that light is more subtle. The light comes on sudden and is bright. Did not feel like it replicated the sunrise. I hid the light behind my TV, hoping to dim it down a bit. In the end, to sudden and bright. Should have returned it but missed my return window per Amazon. Don't have any others to compare it to but hope you have better luck with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Bezdek

customer_reviews.title: Cute and works for me!  But not good for an alarm clock.
customer_reviews.text: I use this radio for my bathroom! Music plays and the lights flash. It offers a nice ambience. The radio is staticky sometimes, but it’s cool. It has an attached string for the antenna. The light is really bright so I don’t have to turn the light on in the restroom if I don’t want too. I wish the volume could go down a little lower. The lowest is not low. I can hear the radio vaguely with the door closed and standing 10 feet away. LOL I certainly would not use this an an alarm clock! The light is very bright and the sound is too loud to sleep. The radio is cute and works for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look of this alarm clock... it's very sleek and modern. It's easy to set and has a battery backup so you don't have to worry about power failures. The design of the clock face results in the time display sitting up higher on my nightstand than the previous clock I used, which makes it a lot easier to see without sitting up in bed. My only complaints are that the display is pretty bright, even on the lowest brightness setting, and the only LED color I have other than the default white is green. Seems like other clocks have multiple colors. I don't use the colored light, so it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mayes

customer_reviews.title: A novel way to wake up in the morning
customer_reviews.text: I really like the variety of sound options for the alarm clock - you can be gently woken by bird calls, jolted out of bed by a siren, or greeted by your favorite radio station. I like that there are several brightness settings- and colors too- for the display and for the wake-up light, which begins to come on about 30 minutes before your alarm is set to go off. If you lose the instruction booklet, no worries- a quick guide to settings is on the back of the clock. The only complaint I have is that the base is unsteady, so the clock tips over or falls off the bedside table frequently!
customer_reviews.author: shannon snyder

customer_reviews.title: Need to read instructions but great product
customer_reviews.text: I wish setting it up was a little easier, or adjusting things, but I do find myself having to refer to paper instructions I didn't throw away. Other than that this truly works great, you can have just daylight gradually wake you up as the light gets brighter & brighter (I set on my nightstand), or you can also add bird sounds or a couple other sounds I forget the choices, I chose the birds chirping. Made waking up a little more pleasant and easy for me since I'm not a morning person and I started a new schedule in winter time, so when mornings are even darker. Great product I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock in January. It’s August. The clock is broken. It turns itself on and flashes random numbers in the middle of the night. It makes a disturbing sizzling sound when it’s on sleep mode. I liked the wake up function ok, but when electronics start sizzling and I’m not cooking something on them, I stop using them. Will likely try a better-made product.
customer_reviews.author: Black Belt Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little wary of this given the reviews and the high prices of other sunrise clocks. But this has worked great for several months now and gets me up on dark mornings. I use an alarm on my phone that sounds VASTLY better than the terrible sounds included on this clock, so I just set the clock alarm 5 minutes after my phone alarm so I can turn it off before the sound kicks in. I couldn't figure out a way to eliminate the sound entirely (though the directions suggest it's possible). I do wish that the light didn't automatically go off when you turn off the alarm, but you can manually switch it back on if needed.
customer_reviews.author: C Mason

customer_reviews.title: This works very well!
customer_reviews.text: I like this clock a lot, and when you factor in the price, it is a steal! The slowly ramping light in the morning is a great way to wake up gradually instead of being blasted awake by a typical alarm. I am retired, so getting up at a certain time is more of a suggestion than a requirement. If I have to get up early, I use the music function in addition to the light so I don’t sleep thru it. My only gripe is that the time display is a bit bright at night even on its lowest setting. But overall, this is a fantastic deal for a light alarm clock!
customer_reviews.author: Mad Mac

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: There are so many things wrong with this alarm I don’t know if I can remember them all but I’ll try The alarm works about 75% of the time only. The radio setting did not work at all, and the rest of the sounds are so crappy I couldn’t stand to use them. The brightness on the time display is way too high. I had to use the setting of having it off completely which defeats the purpose of having a bedside clock. The instructions are so long and hard to follow. I threw this out after one week
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kids with Sensory Processing Concerns!
customer_reviews.text: My child has sensory processing issues and was distressed by traditional alarm clocks that blared loudly. In an effort to help them be more independent but not traumatized I found this one. They LOVE it! Its easy to set and use. It has a variety of sound and light functions thats sure to please just about everyone. My child can set it and turn it off on their own and always gets up on their own now on time!
customer_reviews.author: SphynxxMomm

customer_reviews.title: Holding up after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I have had this clock for over two years now and it has been the best present I have bought for my children. Not only is it perfect for middle of the night feedings but the light is gentle enough that you can keep it on at night without interrupting your sleep while the baby is young and still in your room. I would recommend this product to anyone having a child.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Light is super bright when it first comes on!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this alarm clock, but it was not at all what I was looking for! First off, it was tricky to program and the radio function was hard to figure out. I was also concerned with the volume...even the lowest setting seemed really loud in a quiet room when first waking up. And then it came time to actually be woken up. The light started coming on 30 minute before my alarm and it was like someone had turned on a light in my bedroom! I had to quickly figure out how to shut the whole thing down. I'll be returning this clock and looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMomx3

customer_reviews.title: Versatile clock for kids
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile clock and perfect for kids. The lighting functions work great, look good and are fun for kids. My kid likes the radio feature as well. The radio sound quality is poor but that’s to be expected and is not the standout feature in a product like this. The built in melodies are very pleasant, especially as alarm sound. The display has multiple brightness settings, but can be hard to read at the wrong angle or room lighting. However, we found the right setting and right angle and it serves its purpose very well. The price is right at $20. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyIvan

customer_reviews.title: Great look, fun and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this alarm clock for my son to use for getting up for school. He loves it! He also still likes to have a little bit of light in his room, whereas I like total darkness to sleep. This clock does it all! *even the sounds to use for the alarm range from music from local stations to birds chirping. The clock itself can be dimmed so you don't have to have full-on brightness. It uses many colors or plain white. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: BuddyGee74

customer_reviews.title: Pretty addition to my nightstand.
customer_reviews.text: The clock is really designed well. It is modern-looking and easy to read. However, it is really hard to set (I have to read the manual every time) -- buttons and combo buttons don't always register well. Alarm is very soft and hard to wake up too. Gradual lighting before alarm isn't much help (my husband sleeps with his light on most of the time.) As a good-looking bedside clock (or any room for that matter), it looks great; just don't rely on it getting you up if you're a sound sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This little clock does a lot! You can have it as a color-changing nightlight, a steady color light, there’s a radio on it (which is hard to get the hang of at first), it’s an alarm clock that can be set to turn the sunlight light setting on gradually as you wake up! You can choose regular alarm clock sound or the radio. There’s nature sounds. I was honestly impressed with this and my son loves having this in his room. It’s a modern looking design that does so much! I gave it a lower rating for installation because it’s not completely user friendly and does take some time to learn how to mess with the different settings.
customer_reviews.author: Rene T

customer_reviews.title: Loud and difficult
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old so he could learn to start getting up on his own. He likes to have music to go to sleep. The lowest volume on this is still loud enough to be clearly heard in the next room. I also have had quite the time figuring out how to set the time and the alarm. I've had to keep the directions to refer back to every time something needs to be set or changed, and still have difficulties figuring it out. The best thing about this clock is that my son likes to use it as a night light.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: There's nothing gradual about this.
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing gradual about this. The alarm sounds start at 100% the max volume you set it for, the lowest setting to display the time is bright enough to illuminate the room all night and even if you set the brightness of the light alarm to the minimum, it just jumps to that setting 30 minutes before the alarm is to sound. I had the old model Philips, which would start progressively from dark to bright and from almost inaudible to whatever setting you chose. Too bad it broke after 5 years of daily use... This thing is going straight back.
customer_reviews.author: matthias b jaffe

customer_reviews.title: More cons than pros, light is too bright from the start
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting a waking light for years and decided to try this one out. I didn’t like this one. Going to try another brand. 1) The light starts out too bright. If I’m laying facing the light when it comes on, it’s jarring and wakes me up instantly. 2) Could be easier to program. It’s not rocket science but they could definitely make it faster/easier to set up. 3) Too big. This thing could easily be half the size and do the job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have hypersomnia and bought this clock to try and help with it. I still have to have multiple alarms in the morning, but this one seems to help! I didn't want to shell out a ton of money for the name brand version, and I don't see how it could be much different than this one! The only problem I have experienced is the alarm button seems to get stuck every now and then, but I may not be pressing hard enough. If you are really thinking of getting one of these, I would definitely go for this one, you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Still use other alarm too for when this fails
customer_reviews.text: I have to change my wakeup time due to varying shifts and in one week of use and 2 resets have had the alarm fail once. It's also very frustrating and non-intuitive to change, so the instruction booklet will need to be stored in the nightstand. I'm still using my other straightforward alarm clock as backup. The light gradually brightening is nice and I'll probably like that feature even more during the winter months. Time will tell if I get more proficient with setting this one and trusting it, but it's just a light feature right now.
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Works for the toddler.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Wouldn’t recommend it for adults. As someone who wakes at 4:30 am every day, I would never use this. ***Works well for our 3 year old who likes a nightlight and music.*** Light is VERY bright, so we face it to the wall. Lots of buttons which can be a bit confusing at night if you’re a tired momma like me. Had to call in my husband to get the lullaby playing, and neither of us could figure out how to get it to play past 4 seconds. So radio FM it is.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fischer, Author

customer_reviews.title: Works well as intended
customer_reviews.text: The light coming on a little bit before the alarm helps me wake up without being obnoxious. Do wish the sound quality of the alarms was a bit better. It does take a bit of set up and reading and re-reading of the instruction manual, but once you get the hang of things it is great. Really prefer this to my phone and is better than a regular alarm clock because of the natural light wake up experience. Price is fair I think. Also wish the optional colors were softer. I only ever put the pink or turquoise because the others are too "loud".
customer_reviews.author: C. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I got this clock because you can make the face totally dark. Unfortunately it has been a pain in my butt. It is difficult to set up considering how many buttons there are. Sometimes the birds/ocean sound comes on when i press the wrong button and i have to press all the buttons to turn it off because idk which one turns it off. It’s very loud & there is no option to use the light only for alarm. Also half the numbers stopped glowing so i can’t set the time. I just use it as a reading light now.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Brightness of light changes abruptly and not gradually
customer_reviews.text: The dimmest setting of light was so bright it woke us up when it began the 30-minute lead-up to full power. This isn't a gradual, smooth transition to full brightness, there are levels of light, so it ticks up the levels until it gets to the brightest. Too much of a jump between off and the dimmest setting. Otherwise, worked fine and looked cute. Might be better for a heavier sleeper. One thing that was great about this clock (unlike most of the other cheap ones) is that the sound could be fully turned off so it was just a light alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: jmcd

customer_reviews.title: There are better options
customer_reviews.text: To many small buttons to navigate, especially in a drowsy state in the morning. The "gradual sunrise" feature is not that gradual, the first step is pretty lit up already. In the dark, even with all the displays turned off it blinks every so often, annoying when trying to sleep. I used to have the Peaceful Progression Wake Up Clock, a much more gentle clock to wake up to.
customer_reviews.author: Jens Peill

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to traditional alarm clocks!
customer_reviews.text: If you hate being woken up by annoying alarms, this might be the alarm clock for you. As the time gets closer to your alarm going off, the light on the clock will gradually get brighter, waking you up gently. I have anxiety, so this clock works so much better for me than traditional alarm clocks. My only problem with it is that the light is quite abrupt when it initially turns on (about 30 min. before your alarm) and then gradually gets brighter from there, but that is my only nitpick. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works, but Light turns off after alarm stops
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly as it says, it has an excellent working alarm to wake you in case the bright light doesn't. The light turns on pretty quickly over a set amount of time before the alarm, so sometimes I wake up 20 minutes before the alarm goes off because of the light. I don't like how the light will completely turn off the moment you turn off the alarm. I have to quickly turn on the light again unless I want to go back to sleep. Overall, a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Great clock and neat idea
customer_reviews.text: This is good multi-function bedside clock. After a few uses, the novelty of the glowing wake-up wore off so I stopped using it. It's a good idea, if it's what you're looking for. Many different programmable features and easy to read large numbers. My only issue is the dim-ability of the clock. Or the lake of dim-ability. It's "off" or two brightness levels. At the highest brightness level, you may as well be on the sun. At the lower brightness level, the clock illuminates the room as if a bedside lamp is on. It needs some lower brightness levels. It has worked great and I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cline

customer_reviews.title: A little chintzy, but OK
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted an alarm clock and I found this one when trying to find something a little more fun than a regular "old person" alarm clock. She was happy with it, but I found it to be a bit chintzy. The whole thing is just a bunch of hollow plastic with little switches and loud buttons to control everything. I would give it 5 stars because my daughter really liked it, but I had to take off one just based on the overall cheap feeling that it has.
customer_reviews.author: Agent_CooperTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Finally the perfect alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: I really love this alarm clock. I don't have one and have been looking for one that I like the look of, is functional and is a good price. This is it! I love how sleek and modern it looks. Probably my favorite function is that I can turn the numbers off so I'm not staring at what time it is in the middle of the night. The glow of the sunrise feature is nice too. Not too bright, just enough. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mcmuff

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm clock!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I use it to wake up my cranky kid in the morning. Works like a charm. He's pretty sensitive to light at night and hates even the slightest bit of light in his room when he's trying to sleep, so this is perfect because it has a setting to dim or even completely turn off the back-lighting of the numbers. Lots of sound and lighting options. My only gripe is that the touch screen buttons on the face of the clock sometimes don't register when you touch them, but outside of that, this is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Erlinda

customer_reviews.title: Clock display failed before its time...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this clock for a couple of years. We haven't used all of the wakeup features, but my daughter loved the different lighting modes. The clock has worked without a hitch, but we just noticed that one of the segments in the numeric display has burned out. This wasn't an expensive clock, but the numeric display on a digital clock should last more than a couple of years. I expect this is a fluke and that most of these displays will last much longer, but this was our experience. We are less than happy with this clock.
customer_reviews.author: C. Traynor

customer_reviews.title: The best alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with this alarm clock. I don't really need it in the summertime because the sun wakes me up but in the wintertime it is a dream. I am a morning person but it is still hard to wake up when it is super dark outside. This clock helped me not feel so tired and wake up at a more natural break in my sleep cycle. It is also easier to stay awake if there is a light on. I should say also that my husband is not a morning person and I don't think this clock really helped him. He just got good at ignoring it.
customer_reviews.author: sskouson

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to use
customer_reviews.text: It's not like setting the clock on an old VCR, but it's tricky to set the time, the alarm time, the color of light, brightness of light, volume of radio station, .... it's just not that easy to use. annoying feature: the clock doesn't automatically dim when you turn off the lights in the room, so most of the day I can't use it as a clock because that would require turning the display on in the morning, and turning off at night - I'll just look at my wrist (or phone) instead
customer_reviews.author: Smurf dog

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, works great for my needs! And a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. It comes on in three steps of brightness though, it's not a gradual one like the super expensive ones are. But, I have it set for the morning when I get up, and it's so much easier waking up to this than a noisy alarm. They have a choice of sounds, I use the birds chirping. I bought this because a friend of mine years ago had one of the super expensive clocks that gradually lighten up. I think his was $130. But anyway, I love this clock! It also has a built-in radio if you want to use that, but I never do.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: So far so good - but weird restart needed.
customer_reviews.text: I got one for me and my sons as a natural alarm clock. Easy to set up and great features. However, it bizarrely froze up a week into owning it. Both clocks did this on different days. We unplugged them and removed the batteries then put everything back. Seems to have reset them and they are working again. Looking forward to trying the alarm and wake up light feature. One of thing is it doesn't seem to store the wake up setting? Needs to be reset every day? But as I haven't used it yet we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: J. Darnell

customer_reviews.title: The wake up light feature is amazing. The buttons are not super-intuitive
customer_reviews.text: The wake up light feature is amazing. The buttons are not super-intuitive, but once you figure it out, it works great. Would be nice to have an option to reduce the brightness even further; the bright light of the clock during the night is off-putting. Would be nice to also have some more options with custom snooze times, as well, especially if you could set it so the wake-up light would stay on, but you could mute the sound. I often find myself hitting snooze in a panic, which kills the light and I fall back asleep. 4/5 though, much better than my old "alarm only" one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay - I don't always wake up to the light.
customer_reviews.text: I went with a cheap sunrise alarm clock because I wasn't sure if it would work. I find that I don't always wake up to the light. Luckily, there is a sound option that will come on at the set time if the light hasn't woken you up. If you want to give a sunrise alarm clock a try and don't want to spend a lot of money, this is a good option. The quality is not amazing (the alarm sound choices for example are not very nice), but it works. I've been using it for about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Allison H

customer_reviews.title: Digital display stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this alarm clock a while ago. 1. One section of the third number stopped working about 6 month after purchase. I could still tell time (minutes). 2. It is bright enough and loud enough to wake my kids and me (sleeping in a separate room on the opposite side of the house 🤣). 3. Since the display is now completely messed up (too many sections are not working and I no longer can tell time) I have to purchase another clock.
customer_reviews.author: SSmith

customer_reviews.title: Alarm stop working
customer_reviews.text: This alarm clocked worked for about a month, it was wonderful while it gives many different options. Although the time displays the alarm doesn't work any longer. It seems for no reason at all, it just stopped working? So unless you actually need an alarm clock I would not recommend this to you. I gave it 1 star just to leave this review. I am unable to figure out what or where to go to get this situated? I was told to write a message to the company but I am unable to find where that is, It seems I am left with a useless clock where I would much rather spend my money else where.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: This alarm clock works fine BUT it’s very difficult to set up. It’s not user friendly at all. The buttons are not very responsive. It took me about 5 minutes to set up an alarm. I do not recommend this clock unless you are working on improving your patience.
customer_reviews.author: Eladio M. Cepero

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, lights, radio, and adjustment options. However, it is slightly difficult to program the alarm and the alarm does not always stay programmed in for the next day. The light alarm does nothing for me because it only does the bright light and not the different colors. I would not recommend this product just because of the inconsistency of functionality. Do not recommend if you need a reliable alarm clock. I would recommend if you want a radio clock with cool lights only.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: If i could give this negative stars I would. I bought 2 of these for my kids. Ok, the kids love the colored light options, and they've been having fun listening to the radio. The reason why I'll only give it 1 star is because the alarm flat out doesn't work. It's set properly, we read the manual and did what it said, and the little alarm light is lit up, but the alarm doesn't go off. Ever. One of them worked for about 2 weeks and then quit, and the other has never once worked. It just... doesn't go. The whole point of getting these was as an alarm clock. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: S. McLain

customer_reviews.title: Overly complicated to Set up
customer_reviews.text: This alarm clock is very complicated to figure out the features to the point where it took me almost 4 hours to get it set up, at least I thought it was set up, then the alarm wouldn't work at the right time, then other features weren't working either. It is now sitting on our dining room table, unplugged, because it is too complicated for us to figure out how to set it up. Pass on this alarm clock. It is worth nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock, just one small problem
customer_reviews.text: I really like this clock. The wakeup function is perfect, and the light is plenty bright. One review said there's too many buttons, but the clock explains how all these functions work right on the back, so I'm pleased with it. The only problem is the white clock light bleeds into other segments of the display, even at low brightness, which can make the clock a bit difficult to read from father away. Otherwise it works great! UPDATE: knocking a star off for a dead backup battery and the *really* bad capacitive buttons on the front.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: All the other colors have 1 brightness setting and it's super bright - too bright to be used as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 11 yr old son. He said his only complaint is that you can't adjust the brightness on any of the colors except the normal yellow light. All the other colors have 1 brightness setting and it's super bright - too bright to be used as a nightlight - which basically means he can't use any of the other colors, making it pointless to have multiple color options. They should make it where any color can be dimmed. He likes the different sound options for alarm. I like that I can't hear his alarm go off from my room.
customer_reviews.author: JenJen

customer_reviews.title: This little light of mine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for a teenager who struggles to get up early in the morning. She has been using it for about a week now, and she is telling me that she hasn't had to push snooze "5 times" because the light is helping her to wake up. It took a few tries to get the alarm set, but once we understood how it worked, the process was easy. The light starts to turn on and gets brighter for thirty minutes leading up to the alarm time. It works well for us, and I am considering purchasing a second alarm clock for another child.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Momma

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for hard to wake deep sleepers and non-morning people
customer_reviews.text: This is a phenomenal solution to the rough morning wakeups my eldest daughter has always had (kindergarten age now). Instead of dreading going into her room to wake her for school, knowing it’ll be a fight that sets the morning to a bad tone before it even begins, she now wakes on her own and comes downstairs in a good mood, same as when she wakes naturally. The gradual light is the most tremendous help - usually she wakes from that before the radio ever starts making noise. I would absolutely recommend this for deep sleepers who have a hard time waking, and non-morning people who are disturbed by being jarred suddenly out of sleep by traditional alarms.
customer_reviews.author: HappyGoBecky

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice
customer_reviews.text: Buttons are frustrating to use and it's very hard to set the time light and sound times. Nothing is really intuitive. I've not been a fan of it since I got, but I dealt with it. Now the time no longer displays reliably. It seems like the lights are burnt out, but occasionally they show the time still. Often it's nearly impossible to see the time as the lights are so faint. It's simply not a reliable alarm clock and not worth the money and especially not worth the time I spent researching it only to have to look for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome clock! Definitely Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: This alarm clock is awesome! For anyone who has trouble waking up during the winterknths, this clock works. With this clock, I now start waking up before the alarm actually goes off. The light starts to slowly get brighter 30 minutes before the alarm is set to go off. You can choose between a few different alarm sounds or use just the light. The only reason why I'm giving it 4 stars is because the buttons are a little confusing so if you're like me and do not read instructions, it might be a little difficult to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Light Time Can't Be Changed
customer_reviews.text: This alarm clock does what I need it to do with the exception of changing the amount of time the light is on before the alarm sounds. It comes on 30 minutes before the alarm tone, and cannot be altered down to 15 mins, 10 mins, etc... I wake up at 3am for work, and the light shining at 2:30am really is a big deal at that time of the morning. It is just too much. I am still using my phone for an alarm, which I hoped to stop doing and the reason why I purchased this. I may still return.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: very tricky to set time and alarm
customer_reviews.text: There are 2 kinds of buttons to adjust settings, the "real" buttons at the top for radio, brightness, and a few other things. The other buttons for time set, alarm set, up/down are on the face of the clock and more touch controlled. But you have to tap them in the exact spot for it to work. I tried to turn of the 7am alarm at 6:30 on a Saturday morning while groggy, and couldn't get the darn thing to turn off. Eventually i just unplugged it. The alarm only goes off for about 5 minutes then turns off completely. There may be a way to adjust for longer play, but I haven't figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte's idea

customer_reviews.title: Interesting alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I am giving this four stars is because the alarm clock starts to emit a light 15 minutes before your alarm goes off. There is no way to program this differently or to turn it off. It gets so bright that it wakes me up before my alarm and I don't know about you but who wants to wake up BEFORE their alarm? It's bad enough to wake up to it haha. Overall, nice clock.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Weird noises
customer_reviews.text: Terrifying sound options on this machine. None of them are soothing or relaxing or even non-alarming to wake up to first thing. I’d rather just use my radio to wake up to classic music than use some of these noise effects. Now permanently in my guest room (sorry visitors!).
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Better than your avg clock
customer_reviews.text: A visually pleasing alarm clock with a few neat features. I mostly enjoy using it as a nightlight whereas my husband uses it as his actual alarm clock. We have it set up on a dresser across from the bed forcing my husband is get up to turn it off. I recommend doing this for anyone that's a deep sleeper. The light and sounds brighten slowly to allow for a more peaceful transition of waking up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonmom

customer_reviews.title: Meh...  I would have expected better for the price...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 for my kids the Christmas. It works great as a clock. Radio/Speakers sound crisp and clear. The Volume controls are not as good as I hoped for. Hard to set a low volume to sleep to. Level 1 is just a little too loud. Controls are kind of clunky and when I press buttons on the face the unit wants to slid or fall over. Not as big as I was expecting either. I bought it on sale, but would not pay $40 for it. It tells time.....
customer_reviews.author: Team UDGP

customer_reviews.title: Great clock.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a clock to be able to just see the time easily when kids come into my room in the middle of the night. This is great, with a unique look. It’s fun that it has color choices and the sunrise alarm is very interesting! The only thing I hate is that the middle : is ALWAYS blinking. You can’t stop it. It also is a very bright light even on the lowest setting but you can turn the light off completely!
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: terrible sound
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, button placement, easy to use but major sound related problems: 1) lowest sound setting is way too loud 2) overall sound quality is terrible, tinny, scratchy in and out like kid walkie talkie 3) all the alarm sound options are unbelievably awful. The sound of the sea sounds like white noise roaring and even the bird sounds like it is screeching at you instead of chirping. There is the radio but I prefer to have a set pavlovian sound to trigger my awake.
customer_reviews.author: Rotkappchen31

customer_reviews.title: Love it - good product for price
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and it has made my winter mornings SO much easier. I also love that I can set a sleep timer and it dims as it gets closer to bed time. The radio feature is pretty useless and hard to find a good station but overall the product is what I needed. I wasn’t trying to spend crazy money on this product will probably buy one in the future with cooler features. For now, it’s perfect and it gets the job done. Side note: I bought it during a prime sale for $10.
customer_reviews.author: Blips

customer_reviews.title: Died within two months of purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Died after two months of use. The face of mine was kind of hard to read but I was willing to put up with it because other than that it seemed to work well. Then suddenly it just stopped working like it would just go dead like it wasn’t plugged in even though it was but I’d move it and it’d turn back on so I thought maybe a short in the wires, but then it stopped coming back in altogether.
customer_reviews.author: DempsK01

customer_reviews.title: Perfect morning wake up!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about the sunrise alarm clock! It is the perfect size- it doesn't take up a ton of space and the digital numbers are still super easy to read! Perhaps the best feature is the light- the sunrise alarm itself. I can't tell you how often I want a much gentler way of waking in the morning. This clock provides you with that! You aren't startled or jostled out of bed- you are eased out of slumber. It makes mornings much easier to handle! Love this!!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Finally-a pleasant alarm clock!
customer_reviews.text: This sunrise alarm clock is great. It has a small footprint, the sunrise feature starts several minutes before the actual alarm goes off. There are several options for alarm noises, one of which is birds. Which is so much more pleasant to hear birds with the sunrise than the blasted radio first thing in the morning! ( the radio is an alarm option too). The only downside FOR ME is how bright the clock is at night. There is a dimming function however the lowest setting is still pretty bright FOR ME.
customer_reviews.author: kathyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive yet provides most of the functionality of the expensive sunrise clocks.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for a sunrise clock that has many functions. This replaced a $125 BioBrite Sunrise clock that lasted about a dozen years. The lights are LED and are bright, but the color temperature of the "sunrise" isn't that great - and I'm colorblind. I have the Philips sunrise clock. The color of the light is much better but this unit is much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: shadetree

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive option
customer_reviews.text: After looking at the really expensive versions of this type of clock, I decided to try this one out. It’s easy to set up and the light is BRIGHT. It’s a really sleek design compared to other options in this price range. It’s got basic sounds and light colors, more than enough in my opinion. Only down side is that there’s only one alarm setting, so you have to change it if you have different times for different days but that’s it. Overall worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Emerson V.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job I bought it for
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 2 weeks now and it definitely works. Light has always been the best way to wake me up, and this is definitely good with that. The nature sounds are... Okay. I picked a waterfall sound with birds that was the least offensive to my ears. There's also a radio which I have no use for, but for an alarm clock with a light, does the job great. It seems like good quality product so hopefully it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Jett

customer_reviews.title: A bad one alarm will NOT set!
customer_reviews.text: I had a good one before this one and it worked perfectly, unfortunately, the cat tore it up. Reordered this new one and when I set the alarm for 6 a.m. it goes straight back to 12 and will not set at 6 a.m. This one is JUNK. Sending it back for either a return or refund. So with that said, just be careful with what you buy. Unfortunately, not all of them are tested properly.
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I was so incredibly happy... ...That they let me return this. The sounds will drive you crazy, but at least that will wake you up? The sunrise mode is perfect, as long as you like your sun to rise in jerky spurts. Starts out too bright and finishes too dimn, so you are either going to wake up with the first glare or not at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sora Kess

customer_reviews.title: Numbers are too bright to sleep with.
customer_reviews.text: So far it's not bad. One big complaint though, is that the white LEDs of the numbers are pretty bright. Even on the lowest setting, they are great at casting a shadow on the wall if I sit up. If I want to fall asleep, I either need to turn of the clock lights completely, or face the other way. Which is really annoying considering I should be facing the clock to be awakened by the LED get up light.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great night light, but as for everything else.... it sucks. It keeps malfunctioning where you can't press the buttons on the face. If I try to change the alarm time it will race through the minutes and won't stop until I unplug it. It wont register that I want a different color displayed. It was great for about a month, then decided it didn't want to work anymore. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps I got a defective unit
customer_reviews.text: Great idea; too bad it has a mind of its own. Buttons often don’t work when pushed. I thought maybe it was just my ineptitude when I had massive troubles with the initial set-up, until the first time it went off. Instructions: “To turn off the alarm, press any button except snooze.” Nope, neither snooze nor any other button will turn the thing off. The adrenaline surge from my many attempts to dismiss the alarm definitely woke me up, but since nothing except unplugging it worked, I am packing this horrible item back into the box for return.
customer_reviews.author: April Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Life changing concept, good enough execution
customer_reviews.text: The idea of waking up with light rather than noise alone is fantastic, so the product gets 5 stars for making that possible at a reasonable price point. That said, it doesn't have the most enjoyable alarm tones, and isn't super bright. From what I've read, there are plenty of better light-based alarm clocks available for 10X the price, but I'm very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Powell

customer_reviews.title: Love this clock
customer_reviews.text: The light around the clock is very bright in white but dims when changed to a color. Numbers are large and clock can be used as a nightlight with just the numbers and no surround light. Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: NancyDee

customer_reviews.title: Very cool alarm clock!
customer_reviews.text: I love this alarm clock! I bought this as a back up incase my main alarm clock (my cell phone) stops working. I like that it is an alarm clock as well as an AM/FM radio. I LOVE that it lights up. It has multiple colors to chose from, but I only use the soft "sunlight" color. I have it set to gradually become brighter before my audible alarm goes off. I find it easier to wake up to this gentle light that gradually inscreases in brightness. The nature sounds are a nice feature as well. The chirping birds are my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Witherow

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, not such a great delivery of ideas
customer_reviews.text: The idea is sound but the delivery was not. Like the gradual light feature to wake up. The alarm only runs for 5 minutes and is not adjustable, so if you are hard to wake up it's easy to sleep through. Snooze button (5 min) is between the alarm volume buttons, and easy to mistakenly turn volume up, down or off at the same time. The face controls are not always responsive to touch. I found they responded faster if I pick up the clock. If I wasn't so lazy and generally liked the concept I would have returned.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: HARDEST ALARM CLOCK TO SET
customer_reviews.text: This is the hardest alarm clock to set. Then it's hard to turn alarm on and off. You keep hitting the alarm button over and over and it will finally work. It was for my son and he would forget to turn it off and it would go off at 6am on a Saturday. The brightness would sometimes stay on all day instead of going off. I tried to set the alarm to the radio and it took me 6 tries of doing the same thing over and over to get it to come on. My son hated it and threw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: RLB

customer_reviews.title: which is great with all its functionality including the light and bird ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for two reasons: 1. My older child was totally jealous of the younger child’s alarm clock (same model), which is great with all its functionality including the light and bird sounds. So many bird sounds! I joke, but it’s a great clock. 2. Because Trump is a freaking tyrannical monster that must be taken down so I’ll support Bezos again today.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Scoggins

customer_reviews.title: Great Daylight feature
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and functions well. I got this to try to distance myself from my phone at night. I love the daylight feature as it's less abrupt to wake with. I took one star off because I found the nature sounds to be grating which is the opposite of what you would expect with a product like this. However that is just one option to the clock, the rest is great and the daylight feature is the real star.
customer_reviews.author: AFB

customer_reviews.title: Sunrise Inside
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for 4 months now and like it better than any alarm clock I've ever had. I prefer slow wake-ups, being startled awake is an annoyance of mine. The 30 minutes of gradually increasing light allows my body to slowly wake up more naturally and the alarm is just a safety net in case I'm really zonked out. I also like the nighttime decreasing light feature, it helps get my mind/body to slow down from the day and prepare for sleep. The size and location of the buttons haven't been an issue for me, even when slapping the snooze several times.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I get a rude awakening when I get what seems like a flashlight to the face suddenly
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would wake me up gradually. Instead, I get a rude awakening when I get what seems like a flashlight to the face suddenly...30 minutes before I wanted to get up. After that, I am unable to fall back asleep, and end up waking up in a worse mood than when I used a standard alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ness

customer_reviews.title: what an awesome alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: what an awesome alarm clock. I purchased this for my son. He's getting older now that mom can stop waking him up! It gives him a nice night light and has a morning wake up light that comes on gradually so he has some light in his room without being blinded by the overhead light. It has multiple color lights and different options of alarm buzzers so he has his options. I would definitely buy for my nieces & nephews as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L Fox

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for a heavy sleeper
customer_reviews.text: This is not an effective alarm clock for heavy sleepers. Natural sunlight is the best way to wake me up, but this clock does not simulate sunrise effectively enough for me. I either roll over to face the other side of the bed to ignore it, or it does not produce enough light to wake me ups when facing it. Features are not that great either. It does make a decent lamp though.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Clear but bright
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old daughter asa digital clock for her room. We hoped the colored circle surrounding the clock would be a fun display but it’s very bright - too bright for her to sleep with as she doesn’t like Avery bright nightlight. But it’s very pretty and bright for daylight use. It’s nice that the numbers have a setting for either dim or bright, so it would be nice if the colors also had a dim setting but they do not. Otherwise a nice clock
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: More bad than good
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this! What I do love is the light setting at night that gradually decreases as it gets closer to going off. Love waking up to the light before sound. What I don't love: touch screen buttons on the front are not very responsive to touch. I have to press several times. Volume setting could use a quieter setting for light sleepers. Also an easier shut off for when I wake up to the light before the sound starts. Again this issue has to do with the fromt touch buttons not working well.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Better than using my cell phone as the alarm
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an easier way to wake up at 5am and at the same time, remove my cell phone from my bedroom and leave it as far from my brain as possible. This alarm clock does the trick. I used it for the first time last night and am so glad I purchased this. The soft light is a much better way to wake up in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Shoozy

customer_reviews.title: Good but has its issues
customer_reviews.text: The alarm is nice since the light turns on around 45 minutes before the alarm is set (I don't remember if it is an hour or 30 minutes before, so 45 give or take 15). This light gradually brightens the room. When the time reaches the alarm, it starts playing very annoying noises, but I chose to use the radio setting, so I wake up to the annoying radio hosts, ads, or not so subtle pop music. Unfortunately, it does not connect to stuff like smartphones or mp3 or usb drives, so you cannot upload your own music.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The sunrise alarm works exceptionally well. It has made it remarkably easier to wake up in the mornings and I feel much more refreshed. My only issue with this clock is the buttons on the face of the alarm clock are very poor quality. Some of them are nearly impossible to register that you are pushing the button, which can be annoying if changing the time, alarms etc. Once you have it set up, it's fine, but changing settings is a pain
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Collins

customer_reviews.title: Check The Backup Battery
customer_reviews.text: Backup Battery not working on MY clock. Power went out sometime last night, or early morning. The pull tab was removed, plus I installed a brand new battery. The alarm did not work with the backup battery and I missed a 7:30am appointment. I am in the process of a return. For others that own this clock. If an alarm is important to you (and it is for me), I recommend you check this option. Other than this problem, the clock worked good.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamcatcher

product_meta.title: hOmeLabs Sunrise Alarm Clock - Digital LED Clock with 6 Color Switch and FM Radio for Bedrooms - Multiple Nature Sounds Sunset Simulation & Touch Control - with Snooze Function for Heavy Sleepers
product_meta.description: hOmeLabs Sunrise Alarm Clock Key Details: LED Time Display: 12 hours or 24 hours format (12-hour time displays AM / PM) Size: 3.93 x 6.85 x 7.2 in Output: 5V DC Input: 100-240V AC Radio Frequency: 88-108 MHz Alarm and Sleep Timer use White LED light ONLY to mimic natural sunrise and sunset (additional LED light colors can be enjoyed during regular time) Alarm Light turns on 30 minutes BEFORE programmed wake-up time, and gradually brightens until programmed Alarm Time is reached When Alarm rings at programmed Time, press Snooze button on Clock TOP to Snooze for 5 minutes (IMPORTANT: Touching any button OTHER than Snooze will turn the Alarm OFF altogether) ALWAYS leave Alarm Clock plugged in and connected to power source (backup battery is only there to save settings in case it is disconnected from power) For full instructions, please see Bullets and hOmeLabs product manual To Set Current Time: On Clock Face, touch and hold down Settings button (Gear) for 3 sec On Clock Face, touch Plus button ( + ) until at current Hour Touch Settings button ONCE to Set Hour Touch Plus button until at current Minutes Touch Settings button ONCE to Set Minutes Colon b/t Hours and Minutes blinks to indicate Time Set To Set Sunrise Alarm: On Clock Face, touch and hold down Alarm button (Bell) for 3 sec Press Plus button until at alarm Hour Touch Alarm button ONCE to Set alarm Hour Press Plus button until at alarm Minutes Touch Alarm button ONCE to Set alarm Minutes Bell displays ABOVE digital time to indicate Alarm Set
feature_bullets: WAKE UP SUNRISE ALARM CLOCK - This alarm clock uses a warm LED light that gradually brightens 30 mins before the alarm time to gently wake you up. Features a Sleep timer with sunset simulation to gently dim the room and can also act as a night light

MODERN ALARM CLOCK for HEAVY SLEEPERS - Gradually waking up to light with your choice of nature-inspired sounds is a pleasant way to start your day. Features an easy to hit snooze button to pause the alarm and turn off the light and sound for 5 mins

DECORATIVE LED COLOR OPTIONS - With 8 colorful light options, this bedroom clock can double as table or bedside lamp during non-sleeping hours. Emitting vibrant colors like green, red, blue, purple or yellow it is perfect for a child’s alarm clock

NATURE SOUNDS and FM RADIO - Scroll through soothing nature-inspired sound options like birds, lullaby and ocean waves to wake you up. There’s also a throwback to the FM clock radio - just press radio button on clock top and touch (+) to set station

12-HOUR and 24-HOUR DIGITAL ALARM CLOCK - Wide LED clock face touchscreen shows either a 12 or 24 hr time display and features 3 brightness settings depending on your liking. Alarm clock with USB charger and backup battery measures 3.9" x 6.8" x 7.2"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars3,870 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
